action-plan.significant-properties:
TIFF 6.0 exhibits the following significant properties (note 1). They are the significant properties which the FDA intends to preserve when adopting migration policy in the future.
Image width and image height.
Creating application information.
N/A
If a TIFF file contains multiple images, the sequence of the images in the TIFF file wil be preserved.
X sampling frequency, Y sampling frequency, samples per pixel, bits per sample and extra samples.

long-term-strategy.original: Migrate to newer TIFF revisions or to a format that shares the essential and distinguishing characteristics of the TIFF 6.0 specification.

action-plan.note: 1. InSPECT Project Document, “Significant Properties Testing Report: Raster Images”, March 15, 2009
